author: Joseph Loder
comment: Would like more customization, but great face overall.

author: Jorge Luis Pagan
comment: Watch and phone battery levels are off. Plus it could really use a date window.
title: Disappointed

author: Andrew Hollier-Day
comment: Simple and elegent. The use of HD image is something other watch faces lack, rooms for inprovement might be a sweeping second hand perhaps
title: Very beautiful

author: Kareem Brooks
comment: It's a five star watch except for the annoyance it the app drawer where it doesn't need to be.
title: Please remove from app drawer
